title: Spacious Unit near Theater, Farmers Market, & Lake, AVL 8/1, Lenox 6
posting_body: ['FEATURES:', '-\tBest in Adams Point, across the street from Lake Merritt Parks and Gardens', '-\tWalk Score of 90 out of 100.', "It is a walker's paradise", '-\tOne 3rd floor unit in a well maintained 8-unit apartment --quiet, secure and great neighborhood', '-\tSpacious living room and bedroom', '-\tLarge kitchen with dining area', '-\tNewly refinished hardwood floor throughout', '-\tAmple storage space and large hallway closets', '-\tOn-site coin-operated laundry', '-\tSerene common garden and fenced backyard', '-\tNo dogs or cats', '-\tStreet parking only', 'LOCATION', '-\tCentrally Located -- Easy access to Lake and Uptown/downtown area', '-\t300 ft across the street from Lake Merritt Parks and Gardens', "-\tPerfect for Commuters, including 13 minutes' walk to 19th Street BART station", "-\tFull range shopping convenience with Whole Foods and Trader Joe's nearby.", "-\tThere is a walking and jogging path which runs along the lake's perimeter and tenants can use it daily.", '-\tEasy access to Broadway, Grand and Lakeshore Ave shopping areas', "-\tEasy walk to Grand Lake Theater and Saturday Farmer's Market", "NOTE: The City of Oakland's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants -", '<URL>', 'Notice.10.5.2020.pdf', 'schedule a tour today: <URL>']
